short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bitso Google Chrome Extension. One Click torrent download.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use our extension to simply add torrent to your Bitso pannel with single click. Enter any website and right click at the magnet or HTTP/HTTPS torrent link, and simply click 'Add to Bitso' to download the torrent to your account.
